attributes.action: Deport all Foreign Criminals and Prisoners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We currently have the ludicous situation of having two large prisons in the UK crammed full of Foreigners whilst the overall prison population is overflowing. Change the law so that all foreigners convicted of ANY offence are immediately deported.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
